titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the Mary A. Caurdy photograph.

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

descgrp.accessrestrict: The collection is open for research use.

archdesc.bioghist: Co-chair of the Detroit Islamic Council.
archdesc.scopecontent: Panoramic photograph of the attendees at the banquet of the Sixth Annual Convention of the Federation of Islamic Associations in the United States and Canada, August 2, 3 and 4, 1957 held in Detroit, Michigan.

corpname.primary_name: Federation of Islamic Associations in the U.S.A. & Canada
